text: Nukh skazal: "O narod moy! Skazhite mne, yesli Allakh poslal menya k vam s yasnym znameniyem, dokazatel'stvom, podtverzhdayushchim istinnost' moyey missii, i po Svoyey milosti sdelal menya prorokom i poslannikom, no obol'shcheniye bogatstvom i vlast'yu nalozhilo pechat' neveriya na vashi serdtsa i zreniye, i vy ne videli Svet Allakha, neuzheli my dolzhny zastavit' vas verit', vopreki vashim zhelaniyam i vashey vole
